ygData.subject: Re: New Changes (Was going linkdead)
ygData.msgSnippet: One of the new zones, the Temple of Solusek Ro, is currently us on the test server.  As far as I ve heard, primarily a quest zone with few or no agro mobs at
ygData.messageBody:
One of the new zones, the Temple of Solusek Ro, is currently us on the test
server. As far as I've heard, primarily a quest zone with few or no agro mobs
at this point. I think it's likely that there will be some before they patch it
too us, but now it's just the quest NPCs. I also hear that there IS a quest for
the Shadow Weapons in this zone. The zone will be reached in lavastorm in the
tunnel that teleports you accross lavastorm (near Sol A & B entrance). Kind of
strange, but supposedly you don't run into the zone entrance, you click on a
container laying on the groud (a bag). This information was posted on another
list, so take it for what you will, but the guy who posted does play on the test
server (I haven't been on test in awhile myself).

Something to look forward to

Ailamil Faithbringer
